name: BedMobilityADLOrIADL
title: Bed Mobility (ADL or IADL)
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Bed Mobility (ADL or IADL).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's ability to move in the bed as an adl/iadl.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Bed Mobility (ADL or IADL).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Bed Mobility (ADL or IADL).)
